games.title: 2048 Game - Number Puzzle
games.description: Play the addictive 2048 number puzzle game online for free! Combine tiles with the same numbers to reach 2048. This classic math puzzle game challenges your strategic thinking and planning skills. Swipe to move tiles and combine identical numbers to create larger ones. Can you reach the elusive 2048 tile?
games.shortDesc: Combine numbers to reach 2048 in this addictive puzzle game
games.controls: 使用方向键或滑动屏幕来移动数字方块
games.tips: 规划移动路线，保持最大数字在角落，避免随意移动造成死局

games.title: Tetris Classic - Free Online
games.description: Experience the legendary Tetris game online! Drop and arrange falling tetrominoes to create complete horizontal lines. This timeless puzzle game has entertained millions worldwide. Perfect your rotation skills and clear multiple lines for bonus points. No download required - play instantly in your browser!
games.shortDesc: The legendary block-stacking puzzle game everyone loves
games.controls: 方向键控制方块移动，上键旋转，下键快速下落
games.tips: 保持底部平整，学会T-spin技巧，及时清除多余方块避免堆积过高

games.title: Sudoku Puzzle - Easy Medium Hard
games.description: Challenge yourself with our online Sudoku puzzle game! Choose from easy, medium, or hard difficulty levels. Fill the 9x9 grid so that every row, column, and 3x3 section contains all digits from 1 to 9. Perfect for improving logical thinking and concentration. Includes helpful hints and error checking.
games.shortDesc: Classic number logic puzzle with multiple difficulty levels
games.controls: 点击空格输入数字1-9，使用铅笔模式做标记
games.tips: 从简单区域开始填写，利用排除法，标记可能的数字选项

games.title: Minesweeper Classic Online
games.description: Play the classic Minesweeper game in your browser! Click tiles to reveal numbers that indicate how many mines are adjacent to that square. Use logic and deduction to find all mines without detonating them. Features beginner, intermediate, and expert modes with custom board sizes available.
games.shortDesc: Classic mine-finding logic game with multiple difficulty levels
games.controls: 左键点击打开格子，右键插旗标记地雷
games.tips: 从数字入手分析，合理使用标旗，先解决确定的区域再推测

games.title: Mahjong Connect - Free Tile Matching
games.description: Connect matching mahjong tiles in this relaxing puzzle game! Remove pairs of identical tiles by connecting them with no more than 3 straight lines. Clear the entire board to win. Features beautiful traditional mahjong tile designs and soothing background music. Multiple layouts available for endless fun.
games.shortDesc: Connect matching mahjong tiles in this peaceful puzzle game
games.controls: 点击两个相同的麻将牌进行连接消除
games.tips: 优先消除外层牌，留意连接路径，合理规划消除顺序

games.title: Bubble Shooter Classic Free
games.description: Aim and shoot colorful bubbles in this addictive classic game! Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to make them pop and clear the board. Use strategy to create chain reactions and earn bonus points. Features over 100 challenging levels with increasing difficulty and special power-ups.
games.shortDesc: Aim and match colorful bubbles in this classic arcade game
games.controls: 鼠标瞄准并点击发射泡泡，匹配3个或更多相同颜色
games.tips: 瞄准准确，利用反弹角度，优先消除上层泡泡制造连锁反应

games.title: Zuma Deluxe Online Play
games.description: Prevent the colored balls from reaching the golden skull in this exciting Zuma game! Match 3 or more balls of the same color to eliminate them. Use precise timing and strategy to clear each level before the chain reaches the end. Features mystical Aztec themes and challenging bonus levels.
games.shortDesc: Prevent colored balls from reaching the skull in this mystical game
games.controls: 鼠标瞄准射击彩球，匹配3个相同颜色消除
games.tips: 观察球链移动速度，优先打断长链，利用反弹制造精准匹配

games.title: Match 3 Puzzle Games Free
games.description: Swap and match colorful gems in this engaging match-3 puzzle game! Create matches of 3 or more identical gems to clear them from the board. Complete objectives within limited moves to progress through hundreds of challenging levels. Features special power-ups, boosters, and daily rewards.
games.shortDesc: Swap and match colorful gems in hundreds of puzzle levels
games.controls: 点击并拖拽宝石进行交换，匹配3个或更多相同宝石
games.tips: 寻找4连或5连匹配制造特殊宝石，合理使用道具完成关卡目标

games.title: Jigsaw Puzzles Online Free
games.description: Solve beautiful jigsaw puzzles with various piece counts and stunning images! Choose from landscapes, animals, art, and more. Adjust difficulty from 12 to 1000 pieces. Features helpful tools like edge pieces sorting, preview image, and piece rotation. Perfect for relaxation and mental exercise.
games.shortDesc: Solve beautiful jigsaw puzzles with adjustable difficulty
games.controls: 拖拽拼图块到正确位置，双击旋转拼图块
games.tips: 先拼边缘，按颜色和图案分类拼图块，使用预览图参考

games.title: Memory Card Matching Game
games.description: Test and improve your memory with this classic card matching game! Flip cards to reveal images and find matching pairs. Remember the positions and match all pairs to win. Features multiple themes, difficulty levels, and time challenges. Great for brain training and concentration improvement.
games.shortDesc: Flip cards and find matching pairs to test your memory
games.controls: 点击卡片翻开，记住图案位置，匹配相同的卡片对
games.tips: 系统化记忆卡片位置，先翻开角落和边缘的卡片，保持专注

games.title: Endless Runner Games 3D
games.description: Run as far as you can in this exciting endless runner game! Jump over obstacles, collect coins, and power-ups while running through colorful 3D environments. Features smooth gameplay, multiple characters to unlock, and weekly leaderboard challenges. Perfect for quick gaming sessions!
games.shortDesc: Run endlessly through 3D environments, avoiding obstacles and collecting coins
games.controls: 左右键转向，上键跳跃，下键滑铲，空格键使用道具
games.tips: 提前预判障碍物，收集金币购买角色和道具，保持节奏感

games.title: Stickman Fighting Games 2 Player
games.description: Engage in epic stickman battles with a friend! Choose your warrior and fight using various weapons and martial arts moves. Features 2-player local multiplayer, multiple fighting stages, and unlockable characters with unique abilities. Simple controls make it easy to learn but hard to master!
games.shortDesc: Epic stickman battles with friends using various weapons and moves
games.controls: 玩家1: WASD移动 + G攻击，玩家2: 方向键移动 + L攻击
games.tips: 掌握连击组合，利用跳跃攻击，学会防御和反击时机

games.title: Tank Battle Multiplayer Online
games.description: Command your tank in intense multiplayer battles! Navigate through various battlefields, destroy enemy tanks, and capture strategic points. Features realistic physics, multiple tank types, and team-based gameplay. Upgrade your tank with better armor and weapons as you progress through ranks.
games.shortDesc: Command tanks in multiplayer battles with realistic physics
games.controls: WASD控制移动，鼠标瞄准射击，空格键使用特殊武器
games.tips: 利用掩体保护，瞄准敌方薄弱点，与队友协作包围敌人

games.title: Airplane Shooting Games Free
games.description: Take to the skies in this thrilling air combat game! Pilot various fighter jets and engage in dogfights with enemy aircraft. Features realistic flight mechanics, multiple aircraft to unlock, and challenging missions. Upgrade your plane's weapons and armor to dominate the battlefield!
games.shortDesc: Pilot fighter jets in thrilling aerial combat missions
games.controls: 方向键控制飞机，空格键射击，Shift键加速飞行
games.tips: 保持机动性避免敌火，瞄准敌机引擎部位，合理使用导弹攻击

games.title: Ninja Run Jump Game
games.description: Master the art of parkour as a swift ninja! Jump across rooftops, slide under obstacles, and collect ancient scrolls. Features fluid movement mechanics, multiple ninja characters, and challenging platforming levels. Use stealth and agility to complete missions and unlock new abilities.
games.shortDesc: Master ninja parkour across rooftops with fluid movement
games.controls: 方向键移动，空格键跳跃，下键滑铲，S键使用忍术
games.tips: 掌握跳跃时机，利用墙壁跳跃到达高处，合理使用忍术能力

games.title: Zombie Survival Games Browser
games.description: Survive the zombie apocalypse in this intense browser game! Scavenge for weapons and supplies while fighting off hordes of undead. Features day/night cycles, crafting system, and base building. Team up with other survivors or go solo in this post-apocalyptic world.
games.shortDesc: Survive zombie hordes in this post-apocalyptic browser game
games.controls: WASD移动，鼠标瞄准射击，E键拾取物品，Tab键查看物品栏
games.tips: 节约弹药瞄准头部，寻找安全地点休息，合理分配资源生存更久

games.title: Car Racing Games Unblocked
games.description: Race high-speed cars on various tracks around the world! Features realistic physics, multiple car classes, and competitive AI opponents. Customize your vehicles with upgrades and paint jobs. Master different racing disciplines from street racing to formula competitions.
games.shortDesc: Race high-speed cars on tracks worldwide with realistic physics
games.controls: 方向键或WASD控制赛车，空格键手刹，Shift键氮气加速
games.tips: 掌握过弯技巧，合理使用氮气加速，熟悉赛道布局抢占先机

games.title: Platform Jumping Games
games.description: Master precise platforming in this challenging jump game! Navigate through treacherous levels filled with moving platforms, spikes, and other hazards. Features retro-style pixel art, catchy soundtrack, and increasingly difficult levels that test your timing and skill.
games.shortDesc: Master precise jumping across challenging platform levels
games.controls: 方向键移动，空格键或上键跳跃，长按跳跃键可跳更高
games.tips: 观察平台移动规律，控制跳跃力度，耐心等待最佳时机

games.title: Space Shooter Retro Arcade
games.description: Defend Earth from alien invasion in this classic space shooter! Pilot your spacecraft through waves of enemy ships and massive bosses. Features power-ups, multiple weapon types, and retro arcade graphics. Collect coins to upgrade your ship's firepower and shields.
games.shortDesc: Defend Earth from aliens in this classic retro space shooter
games.controls: 方向键控制飞船，空格键射击，Z键使用特殊武器
games.tips: 躲避敌方子弹，收集道具增强火力，瞄准BOSS的弱点攻击

games.title: Archery Bow Arrow Games
games.description: Test your archery skills in this realistic bow and arrow game! Aim carefully and account for wind, distance, and target movement. Features multiple game modes including target practice, hunting simulations, and tournament competitions. Upgrade your equipment for better accuracy.
games.shortDesc: Test archery skills with realistic bow and arrow physics
games.controls: 按住鼠标拉弓，瞄准目标后释放射箭
games.tips: 考虑风向影响，瞄准靶心高分区域，保持稳定的射箭节奏

games.title: Tic Tac Toe 2 Player
games.description: Play the classic Tic Tac Toe game with a friend! Take turns placing X's and O's on the 3x3 grid. Be the first to get three in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to win. Features local 2-player mode, AI opponent with multiple difficulty levels, and score tracking.
games.shortDesc: Classic X's and O's game for two players on 3x3 grid
games.controls: 点击空格放置X或O，轮流进行游戏
games.tips: 控制中心格子优势最大，阻止对手连成三个，制造多重威胁

games.title: Gomoku Online With Friend
games.description: Play Gomoku (Five in a Row) online with friends! Place your stones strategically to be the first to get five in a row. This ancient strategy game from Asia challenges your tactical thinking. Features online multiplayer, AI opponents, and various board sizes for different skill levels.
games.shortDesc: Strategic five-in-a-row game playable online with friends
games.controls: 点击棋盘放置棋子，先连成五子一线者获胜
games.tips: 攻守兼备，既要制造连子威胁，也要阻挡对手的连线

games.title: 2 Player Tank Games Same Keyboard
games.description: Battle your friend in this intense 2-player tank game! Share the same keyboard and compete in various arena maps. Features different tank types, power-ups, and destructible environments. Perfect for local multiplayer fun with simple but engaging combat mechanics.
games.shortDesc: Local 2-player tank battles sharing the same keyboard
games.controls: 玩家1: WASD移动 + Q射击，玩家2: 方向键移动 + 空格射击
games.tips: 利用墙壁反弹炮弹，收集道具增强火力，预判对手移动轨迹

games.title: Soccer Games 2 Player Local
games.description: Score goals with oversized heads in this fun soccer game! Play locally with a friend in hilarious 2-player matches. Features simple controls, various soccer fields, and special power-ups. Choose from different characters with unique abilities and compete in tournaments.
games.shortDesc: Hilarious big-head soccer game for local 2-player fun
games.controls: 玩家1: A/D移动 + W跳跃，玩家2: 左右键移动 + 上键跳跃
games.tips: 掌握跳跃时机进行头球，利用弹墙改变球的方向进球

games.title: Racing Games Split Screen
games.description: Race against your friend in split-screen multiplayer racing! Choose from various high-performance cars and compete on exciting tracks. Features local 2-player mode, multiple racing disciplines, and car customization options. Perfect for competitive racing with friends.
games.shortDesc: Split-screen racing competition with friends and fast cars
games.controls: 玩家1: WASD控制，玩家2: 方向键控制，空格键刹车
games.tips: 熟悉赛道弯道，合理使用漂移过弯，卡位阻挡对手超车

games.title: Solitaire Card Games Free
games.description: Play the classic Klondike Solitaire card game! Arrange cards in descending order and alternating colors to build foundations from Ace to King. Features multiple difficulty levels, hint system, and statistics tracking. Perfect for relaxation and mental exercise.
games.shortDesc: Classic Klondike Solitaire with traditional card gameplay
games.controls: 点击拖拽纸牌到合适位置，双击自动移动到基础堆
games.tips: 优先翻开隐藏牌，合理规划移牌顺序，善用空列存放国王

games.title: FreeCell Solitaire Online
games.description: Master the strategic FreeCell solitaire variant! Unlike other solitaire games, nearly every FreeCell deal is solvable with careful planning. Move cards between columns and use free cells strategically to clear all cards to foundations. Features unlimited undo and helpful statistics.
games.shortDesc: Strategic solitaire variant where nearly every deal is winnable
games.controls: 点击选择纸牌，再点击目标位置移动，善用四个空格暂存
games.tips: 规划移牌序列，充分利用自由格，先清理阻挡牌的路径

games.title: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits
games.description: Challenge yourself with Spider Solitaire! Build complete sequences from King to Ace in the same suit. Features 1, 2, and 4 suit variations to match your skill level. Includes helpful features like multiple undo levels and hint system to help you improve your strategy.
games.shortDesc: Build complete suit sequences in this challenging solitaire variant
games.controls: 点击拖拽纸牌移动，完成K到A同花色序列可移除
games.tips: 优先建立同花色序列，尽量不要阻挡其他牌，合理使用发牌

games.title: Chess Online vs Computer
games.description: Play chess against intelligent AI opponents! Choose from multiple difficulty levels from beginner to grandmaster. Features 3D and 2D board views, move hints, and game analysis. Perfect for learning chess strategy or practicing your skills against challenging computer opponents.
games.shortDesc: Play chess against AI opponents with multiple difficulty levels
games.controls: 点击棋子选择，再点击目标格子移动，特殊走法会自动提示
games.tips: 控制中心区域，保护国王安全，发展子力配合，计算战术变化

games.title: Checkers Board Game Online
games.description: Play the classic checkers game online! Move your pieces diagonally and capture opponent pieces by jumping over them. Reach the opposite end to crown your pieces as kings with enhanced movement. Features AI opponents and local 2-player mode for endless strategic fun.
games.shortDesc: Classic diagonal-moving board game with kings and captures
games.controls: 点击棋子选择，点击有效位置移动，强制吃子时必须执行
games.tips: 争取率先成王，控制棋盘中心，连续跳吃获得优势，保护后排棋子
